Command *shutdown*
*******************

Documentation for the shutdown command in */trans/admincmds/shutdown.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE:

   |  ``shutdown -t<time> <reason>``
   |  ``shutdown -c <reason>``

Shuts down the mud.
Time specified (with -t flag) is delay in minutes to shutdown.
Use the -c flag to cancel a shutdown

Admin only

.. TAGS: RST
